profile.name: Shivam Shakya
profile.bio: Hey, I am Shivam, and this is my portfolio. I work as a software developer at VRARMR, Delhi, India. My expertise lies in Full Stack Development, 3D Development, Data Science and AI related field.
profile.projects: Over the past few years, I've had the opportunity to work on exciting projects, from interactive web applications to creating 3D environments and games using Three.js and Unity to Solving Data related problems using Machine learning and deep learning.
profile.hobbies: When I'm not coding, I explore AI trends, read and analyze AI research papers, watch movies, and travel.
